parameters: Welcome to the Book Menu demo!
The first thing to know is that it provides
two different ways to visualize ingame
1) A detached window that will popup and
show the contents of a specific book;
2) The book menu window, that will be
The book menu window can list all books
from the game or only those already found
by the player, according to the plugin

The Book Menu plugin works with two
different types of DataSources. That's how
we call the source of all the books data.
1) RPG Maker MV's Plugin Manager itself.
Using this you can setup your books using
only Plugin Manager parameters, and you
don't need to worry with external files.
2) Use an external JSON File. In this mode,
the plugin loads all books from a specific
file. You can use the suggested default
structure, or customize it to your file...
You have to obbey the basic structure
Also, this plugin has a compatibilty mode
for those using localization plugins that
deal with different external files already.
Please check the bookshelf in this room
You can use plugin command to hide / show
categories in the book menu list. Also, you
can learn or forget entire categories with
Please check the book menu to see the

You can use script calls to get a number of
statistics out of the plugin. Some of them
also allows you to check configs, or if a
book has been found by the player.
Also, you can run a plugin command to
reload the book list. That can be helpful
if you're testing and saving multiple
states, and decides to include a new book.
This way you can reload the book list
without affecting the books found list.

the plugin will simply ignore the call
so as to prevent a crash.
